fnsb.macstransit.Activities.ActivityListeners

Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • fnsb.macstransit.Activities.ActivityListeners.Helpers

  • public class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Spud on 2019-11-01 for the project: MACS Transit.

    For the license, view the file titled LICENSE at the root of the project.

    This class is full of static methods that are simply used as helper methods, and thus can be used anywhere.

    Since:
    Beta 7
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getMarkerIcon

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.BitmapDescriptor getMarkerIcon(int color)
        Gets the color of the marker icon based off of the color value given. The reason why there needs to be a function for this is because there are only 10 colors that a marker icon can be.
        Parameters:
        color - The desired color value as an int.
        Returns:
        The BitmapDescriptor used for defining the color of a markers's icon.

      • loadAllStops

        public static BasicStop[] loadAllStops(Route[] routes)
        Loads all the stops from the provided routes.
        Parameters:
        routes - The routes to get the stops from.
        Returns:
        The full array of Stops in all the routes. This is a basic stop for now as there are no markers or circles associated with the stop yet.

      • addCircle

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Circle addCircle(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 com.google.android.gms.maps.model.CircleOptions options,
                                                                 java.lang.Object tag,
                                                                 boolean clickable)
        Helper function that adds a circle to the map with the provided options, and even sets the object this circle belongs to via its tag.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the circle to.
        options - The options to apply to the circle (position, color, size, etc...)
        tag - The class this circle will belong to.
        clickable - Whether or not this circle should be clickable.
        Returns:
        The generated circle.

      • addMarker

        public static com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                                                 double latitude,
                                                                 double longitude,
                                                                 int color,
                                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                                 java.lang.Object tag)
        Helper function that adds a marker to the map at the provided location, with the provided title, and sets the color to the provided color.

        The marker can also be assigned a class that it belongs to via the tag argument.

        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the marker to.
        latitude - The latitude of the marker.
        longitude - The longitude of the marker.
        color - The color of the marker.
        title - The title of the marker.
        tag - The object that this maker belongs to.
        Returns:
        The generated marker.
